title: I just want my main champ back
body: All I want to do is play my main ekko mid. Everygame pick/ban when 3 months ago I could always get him. I hate when this happens I liked when ekko Was out of the meta so I could play him. Can you please nerf him so I can play him again.

replies.body: You should be happy, they are upping his ap scaling and stuff to help get rid of tank ekko. Our ap assassin will be back in his mid lane in no time :3
i honesty cant wait I am so tired of those people who ban/pick my champ that I have been playing before he was considered any good. Oh god I sound like a hipster.
I always hate seeing my main in the LCS because I know people will play them more and more. Hopefully they get him back to where he was so you can have Ekko back :)
